com.connectlife.coreserver.config

Class ConfigSqlite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectlife.coreserver.config.ConfigSqlite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Config

    public class ConfigSqlite
extends Object
implements Config
    This class implements the Config interface. This class can store and restore configuration in a SQLite database.
    Author:
    Eric Pinet (pineri01@gmail.com)
    2015-09-07
